protocol.name: P-MTAB-4863
protocol.text: above ground tissue of 10 day old seedlings was harvested and incubated in 0.5 MS + 0.1% DMSO for 1 hour.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4864
protocol.text: above ground tissue of 10 day old seedlings was harvested and incubated in 0.5 MS + 0.1% DMSO + 5µM BA for 1 hour.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4865
text: Initial stratification for 2 days at 4 degrees
Plants were grown on soil under continuous light at 23°C
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C, media = soil)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4866
protocol.text: above ground tissue of 10 day old seedlings was harvested and incubated in 0.5 MS + 0.1% DMSO + 5µM BA + 1µM IAA for 1 hour.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4867
protocol.text: Raw data (Affy .CEL files) were quantile normalized, background corrected and transformed into expression estimates by gcRMA implemented in R. All settings were standard and all files were included in a single transformation. NOTE: expression estimates generated by gcRMA are log2 (log base 2) !

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4868
text: Total RNA extraction using Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Kit

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4869
protocol.text: above ground tissue of 10 day old seedlings was harvested and incubated in 0.5 MS + 0.1% DMSO + 1µM IAA for 1 hour.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4870
text: (Parameters: Amount of nucleic acid labeled = 1, Mass unit = Micro gram, Amplification = RNA polymerases)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4871
protocol.text: 20 seedlings were co-treated and RNA was extracted from the pooled tissue.
